Name: Poetry and Paean Weapon Chest
AttributesDescription:
Open to claim one Poetry and Paean series weapon of your choice:
Meditations on Mercy *1
Fables of Wisdom *1
Romance in Farewell *1
Legend of Drunken Hero *1
Waltz in Masquerade *1
BgDescription: A standard weapon forged by the Montelli family. Though it may seem like a mere stage prop, in essence, it is a deadly instrument of destruction. It is said that many members of the Montelli family carry this weapon during the Carnevale, prepared for the inevitable...
ObtainedShowDescription: Open to claim one Poetry and Paean series weapon of your choice.
